entries.title: Meta reinstates Trump on Instagram and Facebook ahead of 2024 election
entries.description: Meta President of Global Affairs Nick Clegg wrote in a blog post that the former president will face “heightened penalties” if he breaks the social media giant’s content rules.

entries.title: Beyond the hype, failure still is a big part of the space industry
entries.description: Not really surprising, but launching rockets is hard, and that fact is dampening investors' zeal for the sector.

entries.title: Death by a thousand meetings: How to reduce video-call overload
entries.description: Years into the pandemic, white-collar workers are still suffering from back-to-back video calls. Experts provide tips on how to rethink meetings.

entries.title: Censorship, arrests, power cuts. India scrambles to block BBC documentary.
entries.description: The suppression of the documentary is raising alarm bells about eroding civil liberties in India under Modi’s BJP party.
